{{Unreferenced|date=December 2007}} {{Infobox_OS | name = Linkat | |logo = |screenshot = [[Image:Linkat 1.0.png|250px|]] | caption = Screenshot of Linkat 1.0 with [[GNOME]] | developer = [[Generalitat de Catalunya]] | family = [[Unix-like]] | source_model = [[Open source]] | working_state = Current | kernel_type = [[Monolithic kernel|Monolithic]] | ui = [[GNOME]] | license = Various | website = [http://linkat.xtec.cat/ linkat.xtec.cat] | package_manager = [[RPM Package Manager|RPM]] | supported_platforms = [[IA-32]] }} '''Linkat''' ({{IPA-ca|É«iÅËkat}}) is an [[RPM Package Manager|RPM]]-based [[Linux distribution]] developed for the Department of Education of [[Generalitat of Catalonia]]. It is based on [[openSUSE]] and uses [[GNOME]] as the default [[desktop environment]]. 1.0 version was released on 12 September 2006. This was derived from OpenSuSE 9.1, but with some added up-to-date programs such as [[Firefox]] or [[OpenOffice.org]]. ==Releases== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Colour ! Meaning |- | align=center style="background-color:#fa8072;" | Red | Release no longer supported |- | align=center style="background-color:#A0E75A;" | Green | Release still supported |- | align=center style="background-color:#87ceeb;" | Blue | Future release |} {| {{bellataula}} |- style="background:#efefef;" !
